content:
the saved, cancel etc can go where the Trash can currently is.

@Rishi Gupta currently changes for the name & description have a different check button than the members check button to save those changes.
Placing the saved, cancel etc where the trash can is might interfere with that button.
Selection_066.png
can we just use the same "Saved" and "Discard changes" button for all of them?
Yeah, will implement save on blur for the name and desc. too, then.
So the final behaviour would be, any changes to name, desc and members will be collectively saved on blur on any of the inputs i.e name edit, desc edit and pill container. Is that correct?

yup! We might change it as we change the save behavior our other settings, but for now let's do that. Ideally we'd change the styling a bit when you click in to edit (e.g. put a box around it) and leave (e.g. remove the box).
Great , i'll move forward with the tests for this then :+1: .
Sounds like a great idea, you do that.
